name: Neutrino Blast
description:
Neutrino blast is a simple space shooter based on the arcade classic, Space Invaders.

You fly from left to right while shooting at the block of alien enemies advancing towards your space station but beware; you never know when one of these enemies will shoot back at you! 

This game was built just for fun by myself as a simple challenge. It will be updated and improved overtime as I implement new fixes and features. 

The game is written entirely in C# in Unity by myself. 

Current Artwork is largely taken from the talented work of https://www.kenney.nl/.
